title: President Trump & Gun Control, Winter Olympics, The Chapmans and more
itunes:title: President Trump & Gun Control, Winter Olympics, The Chapmans and more
description:
The Steve Harvey Morning Show discusses President Trump's comments on Gun Control, Women's Cross Country Skying victory, a new episode of the Chapmans and more.
